 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפַךְ‎</span><sub>113</sub> **verb** ==pour out, pour== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Šapâku***</u></abbr>, ***pour out***, especially ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB</sup> [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>Kosmol. 41</sup>) earth, to form mound; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pour out***, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***melt and pour into mould***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁפַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (rare) = Biblical Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.2.31|1Kgs 2:31]] +; 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפָכַ֫תְהוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.24.7|Ezek 24:7]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁפֹךְ‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.32|2Kgs 19:32]] +; 2 masculine singular suffix 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁפְּכֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Deut.12.16|Deut 12:16]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוֺךְ‎</span> [[Judg.6.20|Judg 6:20]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפָךְֿ‎</span> [[Ps.69.25|Ps 69:25]] feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁפְכִי‎</span> [[Lam.2.19|Lam 2:19]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפָךְֿ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.28|1Kgs 18:28]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁפֹךְ‎</span> [[Isa.59.7|Isa 59:7]] +, etc.; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁפֵךְ‎</span> [[Gen.9.6|Gen 9:6]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁפֶ֫כֶת‎</span> [[Ezek.22.3|Ezek 22:3]], etc.; ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפוּךְ‎</span> [[Ps.79.10|Ps 79:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוּכָה‎</span> [[Ezek.20.33|Ezek 20:33]]; [[Ezek.20.34|Ezek 20:34]] — 

**1.** literal: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***pour out, pour*** water [[Exod.4.9|Exod 4:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; accusative of location). [[1Sam.7.6|1Sam 7:6]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי י‎</span>, unique, symbol of contrition), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפְּֿנֵי הָאָרֶץ‎</span> (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Amos.5.8|Amos 5:8]]; [[Amos.9.6|Amos 9:6]] blood like water (to flow away and be absorbed), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Deut.12.16|Deut 12:16]]; [[Deut.12.24|Deut 12:24]]; [[Deut.15.23|Deut 15:23]], compare [[Lev.17.13|Lev 17:13]] ([[BDB#H|H]]) [[Ezek.24.7|Ezek 24:7]] also + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[Exod.29.12|Exod 29:12]]; [[Lev.4.7|Lev 4:7]]; [[Lev.4.18|Lev 4:18]]; [[Lev.4.25|Lev 4:25]]; [[Lev.4.30|Lev 4:30]]; [[Lev.4.34|Lev 4:34]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person reflexive [[1Kgs.18.28|1Kgs 18:28]] ***pour out*** broth [[Judg.6.20|Judg 6:20]], libation (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶסֶךְ‎</span>, to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) false gods) [[Isa.57.6|Isa 57:6]] dust [[Lev.14.41|Lev 14:41]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location); with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִלְלָה‎</span> ***mound*** (in siege), = ***made by pouring*** (earth, originally from baskets, see especially Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šapâku***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB 679 b</sup> [[BDB#Jen|Jen]]<sup>Kosmol. 41</sup>), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> of city [[2Kgs.19.32|2Kgs 19:32]] = [[Isa.37.33|Isa 37:33]]; [[Jer.6.6|Jer 6:6]]; [[Ezek.4.2|Ezek 4:2]]; [[Ezek.26.8|Ezek 26:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[2Sam.20.15|2Sam 20:15]] absolute [[Ezek.17.17|Ezek 17:17]]; [[Ezek.21.27|Ezek 21:27]]; [[Dan.11.15|Dan 11:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָיו אַרְצָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.20.10|2Sam 20:10]] (by a sword-thrust in the belly), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאָרֶץ מְרֵרָתִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשׁ‎</span> [[Job.16.13|Job 16:13]] (metaphor, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** techn., accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּם‎</span> ***shed blood*** [[Gen.37.22|Gen 37:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Gen.9.6|Gen 9:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[1Sam.25.31|1Sam 25:31]]; [[Ezek.22.4|Ezek 22:4]] + 9 t. Ezekiel, + 15 t. (passive [[Ps.79.10|Ps 79:10]]) + [[Ezek.36.18|Ezek 36:18]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהָֿאַרֶץ‎</span>), [[1Chr.22.8|1Chr 22:8]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַ֫רְצָה‎</span>); accusative 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּמִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.2.31|1Kgs 2:31]]; [[1Chr.28.3|1Chr 28:3]]; [[Ps.79.3|Ps 79:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּמַּיִם‎</span>). 

**2.** figurative: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject, ***pour out*** anger, etc.: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם אֶשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּמַּיִם עֶבְרָתִי‎</span> [[Hos.5.10|Hos 5:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמָתִי עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.14.19|Ezek 14:19]] + 8 t. Ezekiel; [[Jer.10.25|Jer 10:25]]; [[Isa.42.25|Isa 42:25]]; [[Ps.79.6|Ps 79:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>); accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> omitted [[Jer.6.11|Jer 6:11]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of location [[Lam.2.4|Lam 2:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפוּכָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[Ezek.20.33|Ezek 20:33]]; [[Ezek.20.34|Ezek 20:34]] accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲרוֺן אַפּוֺ‎</span> [[Lam.4.11|Lam 4:11]] accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַעַם‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person) [[Ezek.21.36|Ezek 21:36]] + 3 t.; accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוּז‎</span> ***contempt***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person, [[Job.12.21|Job 12:21]] = [[Ps.107.40|Ps 107:40]] ***pour*** their own wickedness <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Jer.14.16|Jer 14:16]] (i.e. requite it); ***pour out*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחִי עַל‎</span> [[Ezek.39.29|Ezek 39:29]], compare [[Zech.12.10|Zech 12:10]]; [[Joel.3.1|Joel 3:1]]; [[Joel.3.2|Joel 3:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** hum. subject ***pour out*** one's heart, etc., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּמַּיִם לִבֵח‎</span> [[Lam.2.19|Lam 2:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפָנָיו לְבַבְכֶם‎</span> [[Ps.62.9|Ps 62:9]] (i.e. before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתנַֿפְשִׁי לִפְנֵי י‎</span> [[1Sam.1.15|1Sam 1:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַי‎</span> (reflexive; see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> **1 d**) [[Ps.42.5|Ps 42:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתשִֿׂיחוֺ לִפְנֵי י‎</span> [[Ps.102.1|Ps 102:1]] (title), compare [[Ps.142.3|Ps 142:3]] in bad sense, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשְׁפְּכִי אֶתתַּֿזְנוּתַיִח עַלֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.15|Ezek 16:15]], compare [[Ezek.23.8|Ezek 23:8]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁפַּח‎</span> [[Lam.2.11|Lam 2:11]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׁפֵח‎</span> [[Gen.9.6|Gen 9:6]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשָּׁפֵךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.36|Ezek 16:36]] — ***be poured out:*** of ashes [[1Kgs.13.3|1Kgs 13:3]]; [[1Kgs.13.5|1Kgs 13:5]], blood (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location) [[Deut.12.27|Deut 12:27]] ***be shed***, of blood [[Gen.9.6|Gen 9:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Deut.19.10|Deut 19:10]] in figure [[Lam.2.11|Lam 2:11]] ***my liver is poured*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאָרֶץ‎</span> (compare **Qal 1 a** near the end); [[Ps.22.15|Ps 22:15]] ***I am poured out like water*** (nerveless, helpless); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְּחֻשְׁתֵח‎</span> [[Ezek.16.36|Ezek 16:36]] (see [II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחשֶׁת‎</span>]; compare v[[Ezek.16.15|Ezek 16:15]] **Qal 2 b**). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשֻׁפַּח‎</span> [[Zeph.1.17|Zeph 1:17]] ***be poured out*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּעָפָר‎</span>, of blood; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁפַּח‎</span> [[Num.35.33|Num 35:33]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***be shed***, of blood; 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁפְּכָה‎</span> [[Ps.73.2|Ps 73:2]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] my steps ***were caused to slip*** ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁפְּכוּ‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁתַּפֵח נַפְשׁי‎</span> [[Job.30.16|Job 30:16]] ***my soul pours itself out upon me*** (see **Qal 2 b**); 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁתַּפֶּכְנָה אַבְנֵיקִֿדֶשׁ‎</span> [[Lam.4.1|Lam 4:1]] figurative of slaughter; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהִשְׁתַּפֵח נַפְשָׁם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלחֵֿיק אִמֹּתָם‎</span> [[Lam.2.12|Lam 2:12]], i.e. they expire.
